intro: Elatostema jianshanicum, commonly known as the Jianshan elatostema, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Urticaceae. It is native to China, specifically found in the mountainous regions of Sichuan and Yunnan provinces. The plant is characterized by its small, succulent leaves and clusters of tiny white flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
